code: import React from"react";import{Col}from"reactstrap";import"../../styles/blog-item.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import blogData from"../../assets/data/blogData";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlogList=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:blogData.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogItem,{item:item},item.id))});};const BlogItem=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;const{imgUrl,title,author,date,description,time}=item;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"4",md:"6",sm:"6",className:"mb-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imgUrl,alt:"",className:"w-100"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__info p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/blogs/${title}`,className:"blog__title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"section__description mt-3",children:description.length>100?description.substr(0,100):description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/blogs/${title}`,className:"read__more",children:"Read More"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__time pt-3 mt-3 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"blog__author",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-user-line"})," ",author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:" d-flex align-items-center gap-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:" d-flex align-items-center gap-1 section__description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-calendar-line"})," ",date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:" d-flex align-items-center gap-1 section__description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-time-line"})," ",time]})]})]})]})]})});};export default BlogList;
